title: Daytime Shop Theft — Corner Grocers
summary: Store owner reports ₹10,000 missing from cash drawer during busy afternoon. CCTV shows a person loitering behind a shelf.

stages.info: FIR by shop owner: cash missing, no forced entry; CCTV shows person in staff uniform lingering near drawer.
stages.question: First step in investigation?
options: Interview staff on duty and check roster
Immediately arrest the staff member seen in CCTV
Publish CCTV clip on social media for public ID
Ignore CCTV and call it a civil matter
stages.feedback_wrong: Interview staff and check records before taking coercive action.
stages.next_info: Staff interview reveals one temporary worker who arrived that day and handled cash.

stages.info: Temporary worker claims he went for deliveries; no alibi. POS logs show drawer opened at 14:02 without transaction.
stages.question: Which evidence is most useful now?
options: Collect POS logs and CCTV timestamps; preserve device
stages.feedback_wrong: Preserve POS logs and CCTV — these are crucial digital evidence.
stages.next_info: POS logs preserved; CCTV review shows worker accessing drawer when store was momentarily empty.
